Build quality into every release.

PNSQC connects software quality leaders, engineers, and product teams from across the Pacific Northwest for a week of practical learning, collaboration, and community-building.

Register & Attend View Program

Conference at a glance

  • 5 days of keynotes, workshops, and peer exchange
  • 40+ sessions curated across quality, AI, and delivery tracks
  • Community events including mentoring circles and leadership forums

Why PNSQC

Since 1983, PNSQC has provided a practitioner-led forum for the people who care about building, shipping, and sustaining trustworthy software. Our program blends strategic guidance with hands-on tools that attendees can immediately apply.

Leadership

Executive insights

Hear how quality leaders scale reliability, governance, and customer trust across complex portfolios.

Engineering

Modern delivery

Explore automation, observability, and AI-assisted testing strategies that keep teams shipping faster.

Community

Peer learning

Join small-group exchanges, mentoring circles, and networking opportunities throughout the week.

Tracks & focus areas

Quality strategy

Align quality objectives with business outcomes, metrics, and organizational change initiatives.

AI & automation

Apply machine learning, test automation, and data analytics to drive faster feedback cycles.

Engineering excellence

Advance DevOps, performance engineering, and reliability practices for modern distributed systems.

People & culture

Build inclusive, high-performing quality teams with coaching, mentoring, and leadership development.

Plan your week

A blend of immersive workshops and conference sessions keeps the momentum going all week long.

Monday 路 Hands-on workshops and deep dives
Tuesday 路 Tutorials, leadership labs, and community meetups
Wednesday - Thursday 路 Conference keynotes, breakout sessions, and panels
Friday 路 Certification prep, industry roundtables, and closing events

Where we gather

PNSQC takes place in the greater Seattle area with options for on-site and virtual participation. The conference hotel sits minutes from downtown, transit, and the region's best dining.

  • Hybrid experience with live-streamed sessions and on-demand replays.
  • Accessible venue with mobility-friendly spaces and quiet rooms.
  • Community lounges designed for networking and sponsor showcases.

Ready to join us?

Registration opens soon. Save your spot for workshops, leadership forums, and the conference program.
